inputs.remark: Ordered list & V3: Missing Frequency Patterns Test and Intensity Discrimination.

logic_summary: Added Frequency Patterns Test and Intensity Discrimination to the ordered list of investigations.
Added specific results for Frequency Patterns Test and Intensity Discrimination to the long-term follow-up (V3) section.

value.rationale_short: To assess central auditory temporal processing and interhemispheric transfer.
To evaluate intensity difference limens using a modified SISI technique.

value.name: Frequency Patterns Test
value.result_summary: Pediatric version: 6 mo 30% AU; 10 mo RE 80%, LE 47%; 18 mo RE 60%, LE 30%; >2 yrs 100% AU.

value.name: Intensity Discrimination
value.result_summary: Modified SISI (1000 Hz, 60 dB HL): 6 mo RE detected 2 dB (100%), LE failed 6 dB. 14 mo RE detected 1 dB (35%), LE detected 4 dB (100%).
